mapper.select: SELECT film_id filmId, title, description, release_year releaseYear, language_id languageId, original_language_id originalLanguageId, rental_duration rentalDuration, rental_rate rentalRate, length, replacement_cost replacementCost, rating, special_features specialFeatures, last_update lastUpdate FROM film WHERE film_id = #{filmId}

SELECT a.actor_id, CONCAT(a.first_name,' ', a.last_name) name, IF(t.actor_id IS NULL, 'X', 'O') ck FROM actor a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM film_actor WHERE film_id = #{filmId} ) t ON a.actor_id = t.actor_id ORDER BY name
